dcterms:creator: M. Baatz
A. Sch¨ape
dcterms:description: A dataset generated using a time series of Pléiades VHSR images acquired in the context of the Airbus DS/Spot Image distribution, covering the THAU Basin in the South of France, with a focus on agricultural and urban land cover classes.
dcterms:title: THAU dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Hagolle
M. Huc
D. Villa Pascual
G. Dedieu
dcterms:description: A dataset generated from an annual time series of 23 Landsat 8 images acquired over the Reunion Island, processed to fill cloudy observations and compute complementary radiometric indices for pixel-based land cover classification.
dcterms:title: REUNION ISLAND dataset
